text: Thanks for your hard work.

──Oh,
nobody's here.

(Hmm, what should I do now?
I feel like… taking a nap.)

(Oh, come to think of it, 
Producer mentioned before──)

You're free to use this couch however you like.
Feel free to relax here.

It's okay to take a nap here
when nobody's around.
Huh, really?

Yeah,
haha, some of the members take naps here quite often.
I see~…
(…I remember him saying something like that.)
……Yawn…
Thank you for your time. I'm back...

(Oh, if someone's on the couch…
It's Hana…!)

(Hana seems to be sleeping…
That's rare.)

(I wonder if she's tired.
She's still not used to lessons and work…)
(…Oh, here's the blanket.)
(…Ouch,ouch…!)

(Hana's…
Oh, good, she doesn't seem to be waking up.)
(Sorry… for being loud…)
…You're so kind.

!?
Hana…!? Were you awake…!?

Ahaha, sorry.
I was awake.

Oh, really?
It would've been nice if you'd said something…

…Hehe.
I was wondering what you'd do, Producer.

More importantly, I heard a loud noise earlier…
Did you bump into something?
Oh, my foot just…!

Eh, it was my fault.
I'm sorry…!

No, no, it's not your fault, Hana.
It was completely my carelessness.

Plus,
it doesn't hurt anymore, so I'm fine, haha…!

Well, that's good…
Just don't push yourself, okay?

…Ah, Producer,
why don't you take a rest on the couch too?

No, I'm okay…!
You can keep using it, Hana.

I see… In that case,
should I take another nap?

Since you've
kindly covered me with the blanket.

Ah, you can go ahead and sleep.
I'll make sure not to make any noise this time.

Haha, you're really kind.
You don't have to worry about it.
…Well then, goodnight.
